meanings: (이미 구입한 물건을) return, take sth back

vlive.korean: 대박인데? - 물러 서, 물러 서 - 형 뭐야? Amazing. - Get behind. - He's amazing. 듣기 View video OSEN : MONSTA X 몬스타엑스 'Star Road' EP.02
니 새끼는 너무 물러서 안 돼. You are too soft. 듣기 View video 웹드라마 더블루씨(the BlueSea) : 더블루씨(the BlueSea) 마지막화 - 해피엔딩
물러서 맛이 없어요. 맛이 안 나요. they will taste less as it becomes too soft. 듣기 View video Cookat X Idol : [매떠여 시즌2] Kim Jin Kyung, Jung ho yeon / 김진경, 정호연 전주비빔밥 요리!!
vlive.english: they will taste less as it becomes too soft.

vlive.korean: 우리 다이아 멤버들은 뒤로 두 발자국만 물러서주시고요. DIA, step back two steps. 듣기 View video MBK entertainment : DIA[Mr.Potter] COMEBACK SHOWCASE LIVE
[그렇다면 모조리 다 없애버리겠어!] 물렀거라! 물렀거라! [If so, I might as well get rid of everything!] Stay away! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: [If so, I might as well get rid of everything!] Stay away!

examples.korean: ‘Stand back,’ he roared. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “물러 서.” 그가 고함을 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Stand back,’ he roared. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Stand back and give me some room. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 뒤로 물러서. 내게 공간이 좀 생기게.[다가오지 마. 좁아 죽겠어.] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Stand back and give me some room. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Hey man. Back off! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이봐요 아저씨. 물러서요! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hey man. Back off! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Please step to the rear of the elevator. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 승강기 뒤쪽으로 물러서 주십시오 Neungyule
examples.english: Please step to the rear of the elevator. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The train is arriving now. Please stand behind the yellow line. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 열차가 들어오고 있습니다. 손님 여러분께서는 안전선 밖으로 물러서 주시기 바랍니다. Neungyule
examples.english: The train is arriving now. Please stand behind the yellow line. Add to Wordbook
